channel.title: Gears of War 5 drops tonight. Will you play?
channel.description: Gears 5 drops tonight, anyone else going to be playing? Or excited for? Plus, ITS ON STEAM! That alone is HUUUUGE, finally Microsoft will be making it far more accessible than just the windows store. Not to mention cross play was REALLY well done with 4. Cant wait!

item.title: Gears of War 5 drops tonight. Will you play?
item.dc:creator: drgibbles
item.description:
UPDATE GEARS 5 is REALLY REALLY REALLY REALLY GOOD. WORTH EVERY PENNY.

item.title: Gears of War 5 drops tonight. Will you play?
item.dc:creator: drgibbles
item.description:
4 is pretty good, a little slow at the start… but ramps up nicely… sadly its only on windows store right now, and to download it its nearly 150g’s… yeah… SERIOUSLY.
